languages.text: "Кубис Дельфим открыл Уралону Жестокому место, куда надо нанести удар, и операция "Драгоценный страж" чуть не была сорвана. Благодарю вас, что разрешили эту проблему. Вы вообще оказались значительно полезнее и перспективнее, чем была Теодора".

"Cubis Delphim revealed to Uralon the Cruel where he should strike, and that almost spelt the end of Operation Precious Sentinel. I appreciate your efforts in resolving this problem. In fact, you turned out to be much more useful than Theodora ever was."
languages.original_text: "Кубис Дельфим открыл Уралону Жестокому место, куда надо нанести удар, и операция "Драгоценный страж" чуть не была сорвана. Благодарю вас, что разрешили эту проблему. Вы вообще оказались значительно полезнее и перспективнее, чем была Теодора".

traits.locale_text: "Cubis Delphim had disclosed to Uralon the Cruel the spot to launch the attack on, and that had almost sabotaged the entire "Precious Guardian" operation. I am grateful to you for resolving this problem. You actually turned out to be much more useful and promising than Theodora ever was.
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Cubis Delphim had disclosed to Uralon the Cruel the spot to launch the attack on, and that had almost sabotaged the entire "Precious Guardian" operation. I am grateful to you for resolving this problem. You actually turned out to be much more useful and promising than Theodora ever was.
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Cubis Delphim had disclosed to Uralon the Cruel the spot to launch the attack on, and that almost sabotaged the entire Precious Guardian operation. Thank you for resolving this problem. You actually turned out to be much more useful and promising than Theodora ever was."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Cubis Delphim had disclosed to Uralon the Cruel the spot to launch the attack on, and that almost sabotaged the entire Precious Guardian operation. Thank you for resolving this problem. You actually turned out to be much more useful and promising than Theodora ever was."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Cubis Delphim revealed to Uralon the Cruel where he should strike, and that almost spelt the end of Operation Precious Sentinel. I appreciate your efforts in resolving this problem. In fact, you turned out to be much more useful than Theodora ever was."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Cubis Delphim revealed to Uralon the Cruel where he should strike, and that almost spelt the end of Operation Precious Sentinel. I appreciate your efforts in resolving this problem. In fact, you turned out to be much more useful than Theodora ever was."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Cubis Delphim avait indiqué à Uralon le Cruel où lancer son attaque, ce qui a failli saboter toute l'opération Précieuse Sentinelle. Je vous remercie pour les efforts que vous avez fournis afin de résoudre ce problème. Vous vous êtes {mf|révélé|révélée} bien plus utile et plus {mf|prometteur|prometteuse} que Théodora ne l'a jamais été. »
languages.original_text: "Cubis Delphim revealed to Uralon the Cruel where he should strike, and that almost spelt the end of Operation Precious Sentinel. I appreciate your efforts in resolving this problem. In fact, you turned out to be much more useful than Theodora ever was."

traits.locale_text: « Cubis Delphim avait indiqué à Uralon le Cruel où lancer son attaque, ce qui a failli saboter toute l'opération Précieuse Sentinelle. Je vous remercie d'avoir résolu ce problème. Vous vous êtes {mf|révélé|révélée} bien plus utile et plus {mf|prometteur|prometteuse} que Théodora ne l'a jamais été. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Cubis Delphim reveló a Uralon el Cruel dónde debía atacar, y aquello casi acabó con la operación Centinela Preciado. Agradezco sus esfuerzos para resolver ese problema. De hecho, ha resultado ser mucho más útil que Theodora».
languages.original_text: "Cubis Delphim revealed to Uralon the Cruel where he should strike, and that almost spelt the end of Operation Precious Sentinel. I appreciate your efforts in resolving this problem. In fact, you turned out to be much more useful than Theodora ever was."

traits.locale_text: «Cubis Delphim había informado a Uralon el Cruel sobre el lugar idóneo para el ataque, y aquel incidente estuvo a punto de sabotear por completo la operación Guardián Preciado. Gracias por resolverlo. Al final, ha demostrado ser mucho más útil y prometedor{mf||a} que Theodora».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “库比斯·德尔菲姆向残暴者乌拉隆透露了应当攻击的目标，乌拉隆的袭击几乎破坏了整个神圣守护计划。我得感谢你解决了这个问题。老实说，你比西奥多拉提供的帮助要多得多。”
languages.original_text: "Cubis Delphim revealed to Uralon the Cruel where he should strike, and that almost spelt the end of Operation Precious Sentinel. I appreciate your efforts in resolving this problem. In fact, you turned out to be much more useful than Theodora ever was."

traits.locale_text: “库比斯·德尔菲姆向残暴者乌拉隆透露了发动攻击的地点，乌拉隆的袭击几乎破坏了整个神圣守护计划。不过，得感谢你解决了这个问题。你比西奥多拉更有用，也更有前途。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Cubis Delphim hat Uralon dem Grausamen offenbart, wo er zuschlagen sollte, und das hätte beinahe das Ende der Operation 'Wertvoller Wächter' bedeutet. Ich danke Euch für Eure Bemühungen, dieses Problem zu lösen. Ihr habt Euch als sehr viel nützlicher erwiesen, als Theodora es je war."
languages.original_text: "Cubis Delphim revealed to Uralon the Cruel where he should strike, and that almost spelt the end of Operation Precious Sentinel. I appreciate your efforts in resolving this problem. In fact, you turned out to be much more useful than Theodora ever was."

traits.locale_text: "Cubis Delphim hatte Uralon dem Grausamen gesagt, wo der Angriff stattfinden sollte. Das hat fast die gesamte Operation Wertvoller Wächter gefährdet. Danke, dass Ihr dieses Problem behoben habt. Ihr habt Euch als sehr viel nützlicher und vielversprechender erwiesen, als Theodora es je war."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「キュビス・デルフィムが残酷なウラロンに攻撃を仕掛ける場所を明かしたことにより、プレシャス・センチネル作戦の存在が危うくなるところだった。この問題に尽力してくれたこと、感謝する。シオドーラよりもずっと有用な人物であることがわかった」
languages.original_text: "Cubis Delphim revealed to Uralon the Cruel where he should strike, and that almost spelt the end of Operation Precious Sentinel. I appreciate your efforts in resolving this problem. In fact, you turned out to be much more useful than Theodora ever was."

traits.locale_text: 「キュビス・デルフィムが残酷なウラロンに攻撃を仕掛ける場所を明かしたことにより、プレシャス・センチネル作戦の存在が危うくなるところだった。この問題に尽力してくれたこと、感謝する。シオドーラよりもずっと有用な人物であることがわかった」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Cubis Delphim, Zalim Uralon'a nereye saldırması gerektiğini söyledi ve Değerli Nöbetçi Operasyonu'nun neredeyse sonunu getiriyordu. Sorunu çözmek için gösterdiğiniz çabayı takdir ediyorum. Theodora'dan daha çok işime yaradı."
languages.original_text: "Cubis Delphim revealed to Uralon the Cruel where he should strike, and that almost spelt the end of Operation Precious Sentinel. I appreciate your efforts in resolving this problem. In fact, you turned out to be much more useful than Theodora ever was."
